item.title: The System of Public Opinion
item.description: If there’s one slogan that has been forcefully drilled into the skull of every educated individual (i.e. all individuals) in western society, is that democracy is a GoodTMthing. However, I don’t recall any mention of how this whole thing is supposed to work. You know, how do you get all of these people, in all these different groups, to choose rulers that will act on their best interests and make sure that they keep doing so without abusing their position?
